description.narrative: Children on the Move Advocacy in Sub-Mekong Region Project. The project aim is to reduce the risks and vulnerabilities migrants and refugees face at different stages of migration by empowering, respecting, protecting and fulfilling their human rights.

participating-org.narrative: Terre des Hommes Germany, Thailand Office

title.narrative: 20 Children on the Move's inputs will influence the Royal Thai Government recommendations on the development of the ASEAN Regional on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration as well the Draft National Plan of Action for Thailand.

description.narrative: 20 Children on the Move's inputs will influence the Royal Thai Government recommendations on the development of the ASEAN Regional on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration as well the Draft National Plan of Action for Thailand.

comment.narrative: 100 representatives of children on the move and 63 adult as community children on the move protection network joined the event and presented problem situations, impacts, and proposed policy recommendations to the Thai government, representatives of ASEAN on the Rights of the Child, Terre des Hommes, and UNICEF with expectations to have children on the move protection guidelines for their secured lives;

title.narrative: Migrant, Stateless and Refugee children become agents of change with full participation and act as active citizenship to exercise and claim their rights.

description.narrative: Migrant, Stateless and Refugee children become agents of change with full participation and act as active citizenship to exercise and claim their rights.

title.narrative: Number of migrant, stateless and refuge children trained as agents of change

description.narrative: Number of migrant, stateless and refuge children trained as agents of change

title.narrative: One law, one policy and one practice affecting migrant, stateless and refugee children are promoted, and the attitudes of duty bearers fully integrate the best interests and rights of the child

description.narrative: One law, one policy and one practice affecting migrant, stateless and refugee children are promoted, and the attitudes of duty bearers fully integrate the best interests and rights of the child

title.narrative: The Royal Thai Government's recommendations on the ASEAN Regional Plan of Action on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration will be submitted to the ASEAN bodies in charge of the monitoring of the ASEAN Declaration on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration in November 2020 and the Royal Thai Government also develops a Draft National Plan of Action on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration.

description.narrative: The Royal Thai Government's recommendations on the ASEAN Regional Plan of Action on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration will be submitted to the ASEAN bodies in charge of the monitoring of the ASEAN Declaration on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration in November 2020 and the Royal Thai Government also develops a Draft National Plan of Action on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration.

comment.narrative: The Royal Thai Government provided its inputs to the Draft ASEAN Plan of Action on the Rights of Children in the Context of Migration, which include inputs shared and discussed with youth leaders during consultations supported by the Destination Unknown project.;
